lead_paragraph: The Pittsburgh Penguins do not have a goal yet in the series from Sidney Crosby. Or a power-play goal. What they do have is a 2-1 lead over the Washington Capitals.

headline.print_headline: Murray Makes His Mark as Pens Beat Caps
headline.main: Murray Makes His Mark as Pens Beat Caps
